website_summaries.verdict: This crossbow offers reliable performance for a decent price. Definitely worth considering if you are looking for a good value.
pros: Its lighter weight and lower price make this crossbow a good choice for beginners
Comes with quiver, red dot site, and three arrows
cons: Some owners say they had difficulty with assembly, though others say it was easy to do

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a RTH(ready to hunt) setup. Accurate and rips
customer_reviews.text: Have a recruit compound and love it. Got the recurve because it's much much easier to change strings. It's actually a lil ripper. Accurate out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxsey X. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had this crossbow for a year now and it's held up great. It packs plenty of punch to either target shoot or hunt. I harvested a bear and two deer last year with thing and plan on taking it this year. Only issue I've had with it is the bolts that come with it we're cheap aluminum. I upgraded to a 20" carbon bolt and it shoots like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffromeo

customer_reviews.title: *Owen Wilson Voice* Wow
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love this crossbow. Now all I need is a girlfriend and I can sit with the cool kids.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: good starter
customer_reviews.text: item was easy to assemble and is a good starter. It packs enough punch to flip a dense foam target over. it was easy to assemble as well
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Shoots excellent straight our of the box. Very impressed with this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. The Easton bolts that came with mine shoot just fine. I dialed it in at 25, 35, and 45 yards. This thing is accurate and consistent as long as you cock the string consistent each time. I would have no problem letting my kid take a deer with it. In today's hunting world it's all about the broadhead anyway. The scope that came with it works well. My eight year old was shooting accurately in no time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Justin Green

customer_reviews.title: This is a great crossbow. One thing that is true -- I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great crossbow. One thing that is true -- I'm new at crossbows and it had WAY more power than I expected. I'm more used to traditional recurve bows. The bots buried themselves in my archery target. I had to get a pliers to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Waage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing shoots great, and fits my 11 yr old perfectly. Adjustable enough that I could use it too.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bow, as other reviews have said the scope could be better but otherwise great bow.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Performed just like it should once I got it sighted in
customer_reviews.text: Performed just like it should once I got it sighted in. I'm very confident it will help me fill the freezer for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my crossbow! It was as described and arrived here on time. Will be purchasing from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: It was sturdy and we'll engineered
customer_reviews.text: It was sturdy and we'll engineered,compact,and easy to assemble directions. The delivery was on time with no stress in ordering on line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great crossbow for my 9 year old boy as he loves it. shoots great
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 10 year old fit Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old fit Christmas. I wasn't expecting it to be as powerful as it is. No doubt it could bring down a deer. Very well constructed and not too tough to reload.
customer_reviews.author: Shann

customer_reviews.title: awesome buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and excellent working bow. My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: impressive power. will penetrate a 40 lb rated archery target plus 3/4 in. plywood. light and handy. 2 in group at 20 yds
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's great crossbow i had for abut a year with no problems i highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: mike swenor

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This crossbow works great. It can take down deer with no problem. The red dot works just fine for me. It looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael45

customer_reviews.title: ... he loves it the only thing he said wasnt good was it didnt have a pull for the
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancé for Christmas he loves it the only thing he said wasnt good was it didnt have a pull for the string
customer_reviews.author: anjel arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great crossbow!
customer_reviews.text: Great crossbow. My 12 year old son and myself have enjoyed it a lot! Quality product from Barnett.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Ricker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom it got here way ahead of schedule and she loves it she is hoping to use it this week
customer_reviews.author: Zol

customer_reviews.title: was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was what i expected. i have owned an earlier model barnett recurve bow. was easy to assemble, scope was easy to use, easy to sight in. bow worked great. after item was sighted in, my wife was able to shoot a tight pattern first time. with cocking rope was easy to cock bow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The crossbow is excellent. Site is a piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: The crossbow is excellent. The scope is a piece of garbage. Does not function, at all, in direct sunlight. At first I thought the battery might be dead or low, so I replaced it. Same results. Whenever it's outside, no dots. Take it inside, the dots are visible. It doesn't surprise me because I saw this scope on Amazon for under $20. Buy the crossbow, then throwaway the scope that came with it and buy something different. I picked up a Raging River Crossbow 4X32 Muti-reticle Scope from Amazon for $40 and couldn't be happier. But keep this in mind when deciding on whether or not this is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Larson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this at a good deal great crossbow it does the job
customer_reviews.author: daniel blowers

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bow. While it doesn't pack much of a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bow. While it doesn't pack much of a punch at further distances, it's a gauranteed killer at 25yrds or less. It's easy to cock, the safety mechanism is excellent, and wow is this bow light! It is less than half the weight of my old Barnett compound crossbow. The red dot scope isn't worth keeping, I replaced that right away, but I'd recommend this bow to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Great First Crossbow
customer_reviews.text: This was my first crossbow, and I am very pleased! The red dot sight works well, the crossbow has plenty of power, and it is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: E. Yoho

customer_reviews.title: Definately happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Within one-hour I had this out of the box and sighted, grouping at 20-yards - and I've never owned a crossbow in my life before! I put 100-grain Muzzy fixed Broadhead on the supplied bolts and there was only a slight difference from the supplied fieldpoints. The only real negative I can give is the scope. The three dots are out of alignment(top dot is further left than bottom dot)but even so I was able to sight it in with just the center dot for anything under 30-yards from ground or stand. It is loud - about as loud as a 22 rifle, but bolt delivery is quick. Definately happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vermeulen

customer_reviews.title: Missing bracket
customer_reviews.text: Great crossbow but I think mine is missing a piece, there's no way to attach the quiver to the bow, like its missing a bracket. Who do I tell about this?
customer_reviews.author: P. Helm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crossbow! Has a lot more power than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice crossbow! Has a lot more power than I expected. Definitely need to purchase a cocking rope if your a small person, it does not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: jesse j davis

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to pull the string back to the armed position.
customer_reviews.text: Way too hard to load the string as shown in the pic. You have to be a fairly strong man to arm this thing. No youth will have the strength to arm it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The recurve itself is a great product. My son was tickled
customer_reviews.text: The recurve itself is a great product. My son was tickled, but when putting the scope on the screw was not long enough. Trying to find a metric screw is impossible. He was then very disappointed. We were unable to reach the company. So we were and still very disappointed to see my son unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda BLankenship

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you like tinkering to make things work.
customer_reviews.text: If you're willing to tinker with it, it might make a decent bow. The alignment was off. The centering mark was nowhere near accurate out of the box. And the quiver could not be attached to the bow because the supplied screw was too long, resulting in the quiver being loose and rattling. Not good when hunting. And, as others have noted, the provided sight is way too dim - barely visible in anything but low light. Other than these things, it might be a decent little bow for the price. Oh, and one more thing - these things should come with a cocking rope, but don't.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed as the description and reviews show it comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift and found that this crossbow was shipped without any arrows. Disappointed as the description and reviews show it comes with arrows.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCutchen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: package did not come with a cocking device or wax.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great bow for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Great bow. Gift for my husband. Very happy. Will actually be purchasing another soon for my son. Can't go wrong. Fast shipping!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Harnish

customer_reviews.title: The arrows suck, very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The arrows suck, very lightweight. would prob snap if u tried to shoot a watermelon or a pumpkin with it
customer_reviews.author: J. Gara

product_meta.title: Barnett Recruit Recurve
product_meta.description: Recruit Recurve package - quiver, 3-20 inch arrows, & premium Red dot sight. Archery crossbows with scopes Packages. Made of the highest quality materials another quality Barnett product.
feature_bullets: Made of the highest qualitiy materials
